name: QA Engineer
description:
The QA Team at Viber tests innovative features and products at the user level, manually and with automated tools. They also work closely with the development engineers and product teams, to understand the technical implementations and define the desired user experience.

As a QA Engineer at Viber, you will be responsible for understanding the domain and the product in detail. You will come up with the test strategy whilst planning and testing cases, all while focusing on delivering the best possible user experience.

You are our ideal candidate if you:

You have at least 3 years of experience in testing mobile applications and/or native desktop applications (manual functional testing)

  • Wrote test documentation
  • Ability to clearly and concisely describe defects
  • Attentive to details
  • Be responsible in what you do
  • Your English is enough to pass the technical interview
  • Communicative, able and willing to work in a team
  • You have test automation experience or desire to learn it.

You will have the following tasks:

  • Writing checklists and test cases
  • Testing according to test documentation
  • Ad hoc and exploratory testing of features during development (business logic and UI)
  • Communication with developers and products, designers
  • Reporting the testing status to the project manager
  • Acceptance testing and regression.

Full time job. We’re working in hybrid mode, from home and the office.
